column1: I applaud @realDonaldTrump for bringing #China to the table to negotiate a Phase I trade deal & bring relief to our #ag workers in FL. This first step is critical in holding China accountable for abuses in our trade relationship. We will see what Phase II brings.
Great news! @UF online ranks #4 nationally for @USNews best online bachelor’s programs. #GoGators!!   https://t.co/zCi7prI19i
The people of #Taiwan have spoken very succinctly very clearly that they want to maintain their sovereignty and self-governance. https://t.co/4SzO2zD0ST
Kennedy Space Center is poised to have a great 2020! NASA Rings in Busy New Year in Florida to Prepare for Artemis Missions https://t.co/vOWtH2lwgU

Honored to give the keynote address for @Heritage Foundation's event 'Assessing the Results of #Taiwan's Election.' Be sure to tune in at 10:30am today.  @HouseForeignGOP @HouseGOP  https://t.co/DWMmtyBFpJ
Congratulations to #Taiwan’s President @iingwen on her decisive re-election victory. She is a champion of #freedom & I look forward to strengthening the U.S.- Taiwan relationship.
2019 was a great year for Team Yoho and our constituent outreach. I can’t wait to see what 2020 brings! https://t.co/W0DxzQLRkf
I’m grateful for all the brave men and women who serve and protect our communities. Thank you for all you do today and every day.    #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay https://t.co/JtKw4vpwX1

China seeks "reunification" with #Taiwan. But since Taiwan has never been a part of the #PRC "reunification" does NOT exist.   #China plans to take Taiwan by any means necessary.   #Democracy must be defended.  Read my Taipei Times editorial below: https://t.co/UXFZdyqoSC

Here is my statement on the strikes @realDonaldTrump authorized on #Soleimani and #Mahdi.  It’s a sad and simple truth-these men were responsible for killing US service members and paid for it.  #Iran and its allies see where the US draws the line.  https://t.co/SN1v8NAJtR
My friend @BruceKlingner is right on point here. We must to use all our instruments of power to deter #NorthKorea from moving forward with their weapons program. https://t.co/cX5HmeL4U5
As the lead Republican on the Asia/Pacific Subcmte I will continue to stand with the people of #HongKong and support their struggle for freedom and human rights. https://t.co/rOOj27ubNY
#KimJongUn deserves a reality check this holiday season.   Here's my OpEd in the @EnglishChosun  https://t.co/yeXXea534K

Wishing a Merry Christmas to all!   And we cannot forget to extend a special thank you to all our servicemen and women who sacrifice time with family on this day to protect us and our nation.   Thank you and #MerryChristmas 🇺🇸

Things NOT on my Christmas list:  #PRC 5G ❌ All things Huawei ❌ Compromised Allies ❌  I commend National Security Advisor Robert O’Brien and the @WHNSC for comments on #Huawei and the #CCP attempts at infiltrating our allies. https://t.co/LgmYOPdb0V
Great to see my friend @JooeySiiu speaking about the “ABC” policy.   Make sure to buy your products...  Anywhere But China   #AnywhereButChina https://t.co/XqfYGAeYZa
Democrat talking points:   "Solemn"   "Sad"  ...so why are they clapping?   #ShamImpeachment https://t.co/IAxAvEeGrv
The impeachment of @realDonaldTrump does not meet a single requirement laid out by @SpeakerPelosi. This #ShamImpeachment is divisive because it was orchestrated by Dems strictly for partisan gain.

Pelosi: “Impeachment is so divisive to the country that unless there’s something so compelling and overwhelming and bipartisan I don’t think we should go down that path because it divides the country.”   Let’s see... Compelling? ❌ Overwhelming? ❌ Bipartisan? ❌

The desire to remove @realDonaldTrump from office started long ago. This impeachment process has been flawed & partisan from day one & has zero bipartisan support. #ShamImpeachment https://t.co/KcXhYh4k5X
ICYMI here is a good piece by @TomRtweets on how politics is getting in the way of critical U.S. diplomacy. https://t.co/Pp23JcKBwE

To quote Yogi Berra “it's like déjà vu all over again.” Here we are waiting till the last minute to pass appropriations bills to fund the govt. I voted against a $1.4 trillion spending package that was released to Members of Congress less than 24 hrs before votes.
We must look to our allies and partners and not to #China for our economic security.   The U.S. should adopt an “ABC” policy - Anywhere But China.   https://t.co/W82Tyo8vsQ

When I ran for office I believed in term limits. I pledged to serve four terms & them come home. It's been an honor & a privilege to serve the good people of FL03 as their Member of Congress. https://t.co/3woZ0S3hX0

The next time someone says we need to 'abolish the #electoralcollege' remember today. Look at the members announcing articles of impeachment against @realDonaldTrump (duly elected by 30 states) - each from CA & NY. Do you want CA& NY making decisions for the rest of the country?

.@CSIS is doing great analysis on Chinese maritime militias.   #China’s gray zone tactics create daunting issues for our allies and partners in the region.  The U.S will always support freedom of navigation/open seas and oppose any practice that infringes on those principles. https://t.co/q1cKAL07RL

Today we remember the over 2000 brave Americans who lost their lives during the attack on Pearl Harbor 78 years ago. We will never forget them & that horrific day ‘which will live in infamy.” #PearlHarbor78 #HonorThem https://t.co/g0OCaEhcRi
Great news! 266K jobs added in November beating expectations. @HouseGOP https://t.co/Oue52bjN59
To stop IP theft from China & other foreign adversaries I'm proud to support @RepMarkWalker's bill HR 4892 - the #HomelandSecurity Counterintelligence Threat Reduction Act.

Chinese theft of American #IP has cost us billions. #China targets U.S. higher education institutions & research labs in attempts to steal IP & gain a competitive economic advantage. We must do all we can to stop this.

Since 2016 Democrats have been laser-focused on impeaching @realDonaldTrump. It’s no surprise @SpeakerPelosi is unilaterally moving forward with articles of impeachment. This partisan move is not news. https://t.co/kVNOcuLc2H
We will continue to stand with  #Taiwan and in opposition to the regional aggression of the #CCP https://t.co/QvkHSRG0hl

#SNAP is an effective program offering a hand up not a handout to people/families that find themselves in tough circumstances. I applaud the administration & @SecretarySonny efforts to help people transition from poverty to prosperity. https://t.co/u3lZqh6Lu2 @HouseAgGOP

I’m honored the House passed S. 178 - the Uyghur Human Rights Policy Act.   As the #CCP continues its assault on ethnic and cultural minorities the world must recognize these actions for what they truly are - blatant human rights violations.
Excellent news for our community. Thank you @GovRonDeSantis and @SecretaryCarson https://t.co/vbGFQPgYbw
Investments in space R&D are vital to our national interests. We cannot let the #CCP / #China outcompete us. https://t.co/wZcJ6eGoQU
#5G is the future. #NATO should proceed w/caution when considering using a company (#Huawei) w/ties to #China's People's Liberation Army has stolen IP property & has been implicated in espionage.

I applaud @realDonaldTrump for standing with #HongKong and signing the #HKHRDA.   We stand with Hong Kongers who wish to exercise their freedoms and confirm our commitment to the city’s autonomy under the 1984 Sino-British Joint Declaration.

Yesterday the intl community witnessed a landslide victory for #HongKong pro-democracy parties in district council elections. I hope this overwhelming victory shows #XiJinping & the #CCP that Hong Kongers are not willing to back down in their fight to protect democracy & freedom
Check out my recent piece in the @HongKongFP where I discuss China’s overreach in #HongKong and the importance of the #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct https://t.co/LQBnVIdeLd

I encourage both #SouthKorea & #Japan to continue to engage in an open dialogue to normalize relations between their two countries. The geopolitical & strategic importance of a robust US-ROK-Japan alliance cannot be understated.

#China is not respecting the ‘one country two systems’ arrangement & they must be held accountable. I stand w/ the people of #HongKong & I’m proud to support the passage of the Hong Kong Human Rights & Democracy Act. This important bill will be sent to the WH & signed into law.

Honored to meet with #CTA Pres Dr. Sangay to discuss the long-standing friendship between the American & Tibetan people & the recent introduction of my resolution H Res 697 - recognizing the significance of the genuine autonomy of #Tibet. https://t.co/cq25QRcN6Z

I'm honored to stand with the protestors of #HongKong who serve as a reminder that freedom must never be taken for granted. I applaud my colleagues in the Senate for passing the HK Human Rights & Democracy Act which passed the House unanimously last month. https://t.co/H4l3haxu3P
There are a number of events you are investigating to which I cannot bring any firsthand knowledge - former Ambassador Yovanovitch https://t.co/CLtZ8Wcyuf

Under my #Ag guest worker proposal an applicant who passes the background checks is admitted to the program. The participant will receive an identification card referred to as the Guest Worker Identification Card (GWIC) that verifies their status as a participant in the program.

This is great news for America's poultry farmers. Thank you to @USTradeRep Lighthizer & the Trump Administration for getting China to lift its ban on poultry imports from the United States. #Agriculture #Farming https://t.co/hci9qEATWz
Congratulations to the @FarmBureau on 100 years of service to America's farmers and ranchers. Thank you for all you have done and continue to do for rural America.  #AFBF100 https://t.co/AK8GwkCut2

I’m honored to have been published in @afpc Defense Dossier. I discuss China’s emergence as a global power and the need for a concise US vision to combat Chinese aggression in this new geopolitical landscape. Check out the article here: https://t.co/TY5MfKhz6l

Today & everyday we honor all who have served & continue to serve our great nation in defense of freedom. God bless our veterans & their families for their courage & selfless sacrifice.  #VeteransDay 🇺🇸 https://t.co/yll4KYJmEY
‘No better friend no worse enemy’ than a US Marine. Happy 244th Birthday @USMC! https://t.co/qs5hzrDbcX

As members of the political opposition attempt to return to #Cambodia I urge PM Hun Sen to uphold the 1991 Paris Peace Agreement & allow for opposition parties to operate freely and peacefully in Cambodia. My colleagues and I will continue to monitor this situation.

Once the reforms to H-2A have been fully implemented our proposal would make #EVerify mandatory nationwide ensuring the integrity of the guest worker program for both the producer and the worker. #Ag @JudiciaryGOP @HouseAgGOP

Under my guest worker proposal H-2A would remain a seasonal program allowing producers to bring in temporary workers for up to 10 months. We would also simplify the petitioning process for employers who bring in H-2A workers. #Guestworker

Citrus farmers I've met shared the issues they have planning for the next year due to the unpredictability & high costs of the adverse effect wage rate (AEWR). Our reforms to H-2A eliminate the #AEWR allowing market-based conditions to determine the wages paid to workers.

Citrus farmers use H-2A & there are problems with the program that our proposal will address. Our bill allows farmers to continue bringing in temporary #guestworkers using the H-2A program but it addresses the high costs of the program. #Ag @HouseAgGOP @JudiciaryGOP

Industries like dairy plant nurseries & others have full-time year-round labor demands that aren’t fulfilled by this program. My proposal will allow them to bring in year-around guest workers to meet their labor needs.  #Ag #Guestworker @HouseAgGOP @JudiciaryGOP
The H-2A program is a vital tool for producers; however the program is flawed in that it only allows for temporary workers up to 10 months legally in the country.

Despite record-low unemployment one of the top concerns for our nation’s farmers & ranchers is the availability of a steady reliable workforce. I plan to introduce a common-sense agriculture guest worker bill that offers a solution. #Ag #Guestworker @HouseAgGOP

ICYMI: Well written piece in yesterday's @WSJopinion from two respected congressmen who were on the House prosecution team during the Clinton impeachment. @JimPressOffice @RepSteveChabot https://t.co/OSnomfrS4c

Last night I was proud to support H.R. 2440. This bill will allow nearly $34 billion in collected fees to be used for maintaining U.S. harbors & #ports over the next 10 years. These maintenance projects are crucial for @JAXPORT & the entire state of #Florida.

Big road win...#GoGators!! @GatorsFB https://t.co/IljCj77QLT

I'm saddened by the passing of @RepCummings. He was a fixture in Congress & a strong voice for Baltimore Md. We worked on legislation together & while we didn’t always agree on issues I always respected him. He will be missed.

As Ranking Member of the Subcommittee on Asia the Pacific & Nonproliferation I have been extremely outspoken against the continued deterioration of rights and freedoms in #HongKong. https://t.co/DyE5PFUAIo

Regardless of falsities that are streaming out of #Beijing it is not the actions of the U.S. or any other nation that has spurred mass unrest in #HongKong but Beijing’s heavy hand over the autonomous region. https://t.co/VRslJ648yO

This week we celebrated Taiwan’s National Day. Taiwan stands tall as a representative democracy an exemplar of human rights and great friend of the US. As we celebrate this along with the 40th anniversary of the #TRA we must continue to support a strong US-Taiwan relationship.

I commend Sec Pompeo for imposing visa restrictions on CCP officials who are involved in the abuse of Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities in China. China’s oppression of over 1 million Uyghurs will not be tolerated. We must hold CCP officials accountable for these atrocities.
Great news from the September Jobs Report- the unemployment rate dropped to 3.5% last month- the lowest it has been in 50 years! Great work @realDonaldTrump!
Individuals who are unable to verify their identity will not be permitted to enter the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) checkpoint and will not be allowed to fly. https://t.co/leC5mjJoq7

Beginning October 1 2020 every air traveler must present a REAL ID-compliant driver’s license state-issued enhanced driver’s license or other acceptable forms of identification such as a valid passport or U.S. military ID to fly within the United States. #REALIDReady

POTUS should resume maximum sanction pressure with no concessions until #KimJongUn agrees to a denuclearized North Korea. Also our conversations with #SouthKorea & #Japan will continue to bring this to a peaceful resolution. @HouseForeignGOP

This is a reminder of why sanctions should be imposed on #NorthKorea by all 15 members of the U.N Security Council. With #Russia & #China not enforcing sanctions #KimJongUn is only emboldened to continue this behavior. https://t.co/JY2PSz4Qeq

As we celebrate @NASA 61st birthday I'm honored to have met with my friend @JimBridenstine  before the Oct. recess. The R&D they are doing to get the US back to the #moon & to #Mars is unparalleled. Looking forward to seeing their continued contributions to human life in #space

At an extremely turbulent time we are witnessing #democracy beginning to erode in #HongKong threats against the autonomous nation of #Taiwan & the imprisonment of China’s own #Uyghur population in Xinjiang. #CCP70

These sanctions will deny the Iranian regime critical income to meddle in foreign conflicts advance their ballistic missile development & fund terror around the world. https://t.co/LFKUBXfXVL

Today’s announcement of the bilateral trade agreement between the U.S. & #Japan is welcome news for Florida’s #agriculture community. Both countries will benefit from a reduction in tariffs & an increase in market access. https://t.co/uuFc0KloPe

#DFC places the US govt & private sector in a much better position to engage & compete in countries across Asia Africa & Latin America. DFC represents a major reform to our US foreign aid system emphasizing the need to move developing countries down the path from aid to trade.

Honored to join the Development Finance Leadership Roundtable to discuss the importance of development finance. The bipartisan #BUILDAct I authored & was signed into law streamlines US foreign aid w/the creation of the Development Finance Corp (DFC). https://t.co/f0NfpI10fC

The negative view on #China is largely bipartisan with a majority of both Republicans and Democrats indicating concerns. "Republicans and Democrats largely agree in their assessments of how China’s growing economy and military will affect the U.S."  @pewresearch

Americans also increasingly see #China as a threat. Around a quarter of Americans (24%) name China as the country or group that poses the greatest threat to the U.S. in the future twice as many as said the same in 2007.

Unfavorable opinions of #China have reached a 14-year high. Today 60% of Americans have an unfavorable opinion of China up from 47% in 2018 and at the highest level since #PewResearch Center began asking the question.

The American people have become increasingly concerned about #China and they should be. Read the recent @pewresearch survey: 'Americans' unfavorable view of China reaches new high" https://t.co/j8QBwYrBy2

For the second time in less than a week another nation chose to sever ties with #Taiwan in favor of the #PRC. I urge other countries not to continue this trend looking to the PRC for financial assistance eventually leaves nations economically & politically beholden to the #CCP.

Today & every day we remember the brave Americans who were #POW & those who never came home. Honored to join @RepAlLawsonJr & @RepRutherfordFL on a bill to establish a POW-MIA Memorial at Cecil Field in Jacksonville. #POWMIARecognitionDay #HonorThem https://t.co/jkCMXO1SB3

Yesterday we celebrated the Hyundai @hopeonwheels  grant recipients- of which the @UF Shands Children’s Hospital received a scholar hope grant for pediatric cancer research. As of this year Hyundai Hope on Wheels has reached $160M in funding for #pediatric #cancer research. https://t.co/kFuYvmHzZV

The American dream comes from opportunity.   Opportunity comes from our founding principles our core values held together & protected by the #Constitution. Those ideas are neither Rep/Dem conservative/liberal white/black. Those are American ideologies. https://t.co/voyYimK57M

It's unfortunate the #SolomonIslands govt would break their long-standing diplomatic ties with #Taiwan in favor of the #PRC.  Taiwan is a trusted partner to the Solomons & an important democratic partner in the Indo-Pacific. This move undermines Taiwan & emboldens the #CCP.

While at the same time their intellectual property is copied produced and put into direct competition in sales. I am happy to see that companies are beginning to realize these repercussions and are moving their businesses to other regions like #SoutheastAsia and #India.

For the past year & a half I've shared my "ABC" philosophy w/businesses I meet with. That is to manufacture 'Anywhere But China.' Manufacturers who cont to produce in China must understand that their business engagement will leave them increasingly beholden to the CCP.
In a recent AMCHAM poll more than 1/4 of respondents said they had redirected investments originally planned for #China to other locations - up 6.9% from last year.   https://t.co/86Q3EUPOl5

I've been speaking and working with producers all across  FL and the country to identify their immediate and long term needs. This coming week I will be holding more listening sessions in central and south FL to continue those conversations.

For too long our nation’s #farmers have struggled to find enough labor to harvest crops or tend livestock. It is the responsibly of Congress to act and ensure our producers have a reliable workforce. #agriculture

The continuation of #HongKongProtests including today’s closing of the city’s intl airport shows that rising resentment in Hong Kong is not simply a result of the ill-fated extradition law but the continued encroachment on freedoms & liberties by #XiJinping & the CCP.
